channel.title: MP:spawn only on 2 entities
channel.description: After the release of the latest patch I noticed that on my map in BM my friends and I spawn only in 2-3 different points while the spawn points on the map 12. I saw an example of spawn on the maps and did the same but we have to continue to spawn 2-3 points. Its bug ? Or strong random ? As well as the top 10 on the server writes non-existent nicks with a huge number of kills. How i can reset stats?

item.title: MP:spawn only on 2 entities
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
We’re fixing the spawn bug at the moment, I think it’s addressed on the public beta branch, which we’re polishing up for a launch soon.

Read full topic

item.title: MP:spawn only on 2 entities

item.description:
After the release of the latest patch I noticed that on my map in BM my friends and I spawn only in 2-3 different points while the spawn points on the map 12.
I saw an example of spawn on the maps and did the same but we have to continue to spawn 2-3 points. Its bug ? Or strong random ?
As well as the top 10 on the server writes non-existent nicks with a huge number of kills. How i can reset stats?
